channel.title: [pi] clicking buttons

item.title: [pi] clicking buttons
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

Dell:

You have to add the dialogue itself, including teleports and all, you just added click able dialogue … as well as shop, the reason the shop isn’t showing is because it doesn’t exist. . . you have to declare shop 37 in your client.java if its not already there. . .

Declare shop 37 in client.java? You open shops in actionhandler.java and make shops in shop.cfg

Read full topic

item.title: [pi] clicking buttons
item.dc:creator: @liamp liamp
item.description:
@liamp wrote:

hello i added a dungeoneering base to my source and i added everything correct

when you try and click the dialog for it to teleport you or go to the shop it dont work
picture off it

case 9178: if(c.dialogueAction == 242) { c.getPA().removeAllWindows(); c.checkEmpty(); c.getDungeoneering().Dung(c); }
[code]break;

		case 9179:
                            if(c.dialogueAction == 242) {
                                    c.checkEmpty2();
                                    c.getPA().removeAllWindows();
                            }[/code]		
		[code]break;
		
		case 9180:
                            if(c.dialogueAction == 242) {
                                    c.getPA().removeAllWindows();
                                    c.sendMessage("Your current Dungeoneering level: "+c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[23])+"");
                                    c.sendMessage("Total amount of tokens: "+c.dungtokens+"");
                            }[/code]			
		[code]break;
		
		case 9181:
                            if(c.dialogueAction == 242) {
                                    c.getShops().openShop(37);
                            }[/code]			
		[code]break;
		
		case 9157:
                            if (c.dialogueAction == 1327) {
                                    c.getItems().deleteAllItems();
                                    c.getDungeoneering().redostartfloor1(c); 
							}[/code]
		[code]break;
		
		case 9158:
                    if (c.dialogueAction == 1327) {
                            c.getDungeoneering().leaveDung(c);	
					}[/code]

Read full topic
